channel.title: Need help with random drops in nixscape
channel.description: I'm trying to make random drops in nixscape so I am editing the npcdrops.cfg, to make a random drop what does the droptype need to be?? the only way I can get drops to work is setting it (drop type) to 0, but then it drops ALL the specified items EVERYTIME the monster dies. any other drop type results in dwarf remains 99% of the time!?(even though i never even put dwarf remains under possible drops) :mad: will it be necessary to write my own random drop feater in the npchandler.java??

item.title: Need help with random drops in nixscape
item.dc:creator: @i_ownd_u_i i ownd u i
item.description:
@i_ownd_u_i wrote:

open server file and look at the npc drops

then open npchandel

then do what it says

where it says { ( here add like this ) 1092, 5893, 8699

and so on

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with random drops in nixscape
item.dc:creator: @Takajin Takajin++
item.description:
@Takajin wrote:

Droptype 0 is a 100% drop which is usually bones… Besides that I have no idea what the others are D:

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with random drops in nixscape
item.dc:creator: @Mmmm_Java Mmmm Java
item.description:
@Mmmm_Java wrote:

I’m trying to make random drops in nixscape so I am editing the npcdrops.cfg, to make a random drop what does the droptype need to be?? the only way I can get drops to work is setting it (drop type) to 0, but then it drops ALL the specified items EVERYTIME the monster dies. any other drop type results in dwarf remains 99% of the time!?(even though i never even put dwarf remains under possible drops) :mad: will it be necessary to write my own random drop feater in the npchandler.java??

Read full topic
